verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall this <S%H7892>song<s%> be <S%H7891>sung<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: we have a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>; <S%H3444>salvation<s%> will he <S%H7896>appoint<s%> for <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H2426>bulwarks<s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> ye the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> which <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H529>faith<s%> may enter <S%H935>in<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H5341>keep<s%> him in <S%H7965>perfect<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, whose <S%H3336>mind<s%> is <S%H5564>stayed<s%> on <S%H982>thee<s%>; because he trusteth in thee.
Trust <S%H982><s%> ye in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>; for in <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>, even <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6697>rock<s%>.

For he hath brought <S%H7817>down<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, the <S%H7682>lofty<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>: he layeth it <S%H8213>low<s%>, he layeth it <S%H8213>low<s%> even to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; he <S%H5060>bringeth<s%> it even to the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
The <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall tread it <S%H7429>down<s%>; even the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, and the <S%H6471>steps<s%> of the <S%H1800>needy<s%>.
The <S%H734>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is <S%H4339>uprightness<s%>: thou that art <S%H3477>upright<s%> dost <S%H6424>direct<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%>.

Yea <S%H734><s%>, in the way of thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, have we <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H2143>thee<s%>; to thy name, even to thy memorial <S%H8034>name<s%>, is the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of our <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

With my <S%H5315>soul<s%> have I <S%H183>desired<s%> thee in the <S%H3915>night<s%>; <S%H7307>yea<s%>, with my spirit <S%H7130>within<s%> me will I seek thee <S%H7836>earnestly<s%>: for when thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.

Let favor be <S%H2603>showed<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, yet will he <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5229>uprightness<s%> will he deal <S%H5765>wrongfully<s%>, and will <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H1348>majesty<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up<s%>, yet they <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H2372>not<s%>: but they shall see thy <S%H7068>zeal<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>; <S%H784>yea<s%>, fire shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou wilt <S%H8239>ordain<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> for <S%H6466>us<s%>; for thou hast also wrought all our works for <S%H4639>us<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, other <S%H113>lords<s%> <S%H2108>besides<s%> thee have had <S%H1166>dominion<s%> over <S%H2142>us<s%>; but by thee only will we make mention of thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

They are <S%H4191>dead<s%>, they shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>; they are <S%H7496>deceased<s%>, they shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%>: therefore hast thou <S%H6485>visited<s%> and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H2143>them<s%>, and made all remembrance of them to <S%H6>perish<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%>; thou art <S%H3513>glorified<s%>; thou hast <S%H7368>enlarged<s%> all the <S%H7099>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in <S%H6862>trouble<s%> have they <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6694>thee<s%>; they poured out a <S%H3908>prayer<s%> when thy chastening was upon <S%H4148>them<s%>.

Like <S%H3644><s%> as a woman with <S%H2030>child<s%>, that draweth <S%H7126>near<s%> the time of her <S%H3205>delivery<s%>, is in <S%H2342>pain<s%> and crieth <S%H2199>out<s%> in her <S%H2256>pangs<s%>; so we have been <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah.

We have been with <S%H2029>child<s%>, we have been in <S%H2342>pain<s%>, we have as it <S%H3644>were<s%> brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>; we have not <S%H6213>wrought<s%> any <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>; <S%H1077>neither<s%> have the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>.

Thy <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; my dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall <S%H6965>arise<s%>. <S%H6974>Awake<s%> and <S%H7442>sing<s%>, ye that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>; for thy <S%H2919>dew<s%> is as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H219>herbs<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall cast <S%H5307>forth<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%>.

Come <S%H3212><s%>, my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H935>enter<s%> thou into thy <S%H2315>chambers<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> thy <S%H1817>doors<s%> about <S%H2247>thee<s%>: hide thyself for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%>, until the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> be <S%H5674>overpast<s%>.

For <S%H3068><s%>, behold, Jehovah cometh forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: the <S%H776>earth<s%> also shall <S%H1540>disclose<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and shall no more <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H2026>slain<s%>.
